Package no.ntnu.idatx1005.observer

Interface TaskEventObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseViewController, DistributionViewController, EditTaskViewController, InsightsViewController, NewTaskViewController, SettingsViewController, TasksViewController
public interface TaskEventObserver

TaskEventObserver interface

This interface defines the methods for observing task-related events.

Since:
V1.1.0
Author:
William Holtsdalen
